About

Graduated in Systems Analysis and Development from Estácio de Sá, with an MBA in Software Engineering from Impacta in Brazil and studying digital game development at IPMAIA in Portugal. I really like technology, getting to know new and simple things that generate more productivity and impact for people.

Work Experience

Software Engineering Itaú Unibanco Brazil Set 2020 - Mai 2023 QA Junior Test Analyst Itaú Unibanco Brazil Fev 2020 - Set 2020 QA Junior Test Analyst Cognizant Brazil Nov 2018 - Fev 2020

Education

Technical degree course in Produção Multimédia e Jogos Digitais Bangalore Instutute of Technology Set 2022 - Set 2024 Master of Business Administration - Software Engineering Impacta Tecnologia Abr 2021 - Mar 2022 Technical degree course in System Development Analysis Estácio Sá 2017 - 2019
